name: TaskTestcaseTemplate
description: Create templates for tasks and test cases to apply to multiple user stories.
author: Aliaksei Shytkin <shitkin@targetprocess.com>

scripts.build:production: webpack --output-path build --config webpack-production.config.js && mv build/index.js build/release.js
scripts.build:library: rm -rf build/library && webpack --output-path build/library --config webpack-library.config.js && cp docs/README.md build/library/README.mkd && cp docs/*.png build/library
scripts.build:all: npm run build:production && npm run build:library
scripts.commit: npm test && npm shrinkwrap --dev && npm run build:all && git add -A build npm-shrinkwrap.json && git commit -m 'Build' && git push origin HEAD
